item.title: Travel Guide: The 10 Most Beautiful Border Cities in China! Experience Unique Ethnic Characteristics
item.description: The 10 Most Beautiful Border Cities in China! 1. Manzhouli (Inner Mongolia) - The Window of East Asia Located in the western part of Hulunbuir, Inner Mongolia, Manzhouli is a border city brimming with exotic charm. Bordering Russia to the north, this city blends the cultures of China, Russia, and Mongolia. Manzhouli’s architecture is unique, combining European, Chinese, and Russian styles, creating a bustling and picturesque atmosphere. Walking through the streets feels like stepping into a fairytale world full of mystery.
